message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to make a deal at that price, but I'm not sure I can go any lower.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but $80 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $105?
I'm not sure I can meet you at $105, but I'm willing to consider $90. I'm trying to save as much money as possible, so I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
